statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT service_type, technician_name, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE service_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE technician_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM vehicle_maintenance;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, service_type FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT technician_name FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE service_type LIKE '%oil%' AND cost < 500;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT maintenance_date, service_type, technician_name, CONCAT('Maintenance Cost: $', cost) AS cost_info FROM vehicle_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC, cost DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT mechanic_name, service_cost, service_description FROM service_records ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_description FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_name, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-12-31';
SELECT vehicle_name, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance;
SELECT * FROM service_records WHERE service_cost > 1000 ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, last_maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT vehicle_name, next_maintenance_date, COUNT(service_id) AS num_services FROM vehicle_maintenance JOIN service_records ON vehicle_maintenance.vehicle_id = service_records.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicle_name, next_maintenance_date;
SELECT vehicle_id, mechanic_name, service_description, service_cost FROM service_records WHERE service_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY mechanic_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT service_type, service_cost FROM service_records WHERE service_cost > 1000;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE service_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM service_records WHERE technician_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT service_type, recommended_mileage FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY recommended_mileage ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE service_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type, service_mileage FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE service_type = 'Tire Rotation' ORDER BY service_mileage DESC;
SELECT service_type, service_date FROM service_records WHERE service_cost > 1000 AND technician_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT service_type, service_date, service_cost FROM service_records JOIN vehicle_maintenance ON service_records.vehicle_id = vehicle_maintenance.vehicle_id WHERE vehicle_maintenance.service_mileage < 5000;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE recommended_mileage BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY schedule_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2010
SELECT vin, make, model FROM Vehicles ORDER BY make DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, make, year FROM Vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota'
SELECT * FROM AssignedTasks JOIN Mechanics ON AssignedTasks.mechanic_id = Mechanics.mechanic_id
SELECT * FROM Vehicles ORDER BY make DESC, year ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2010 AND make = 'Toyota';
SELECT r.service_date, r.service_description, m.name FROM MaintenanceRecords r JOIN Mechanics m ON r.cost > 500 AND m.specialty = 'Engine';
SELECT v.make, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenances FROM Vehicles v JOIN MaintenanceRecords mr ON v.vehicle_id = mr.vehicle_id GROUP BY v.make;
SELECT t.task_description, m.name FROM AssignedTasks t JOIN Mechanics m ON t.mechanic_id = m.mechanic_id WHERE t.estimated_hours > 5 ORDER BY t.task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, mileage FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT DISTINCT make FROM Vehicle;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE mechanic = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year = 2018;
SELECT make, model, year, mileage FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, mechanic FROM MaintenanceRecord ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type, service_date, service_cost FROM ServiceRecord WHERE service_cost > 500 ORDER BY service_cost ASC;
SELECT v.make, v.model, p.part_name, p.price FROM Vehicle v JOIN VehicleParts vp ON v.vehicle_id = vp.vehicle_id JOIN PartsUsed p ON vp.part_id = p.part_id WHERE v.make = 'Honda';
